title: Latest news
subtitle: The latest news, thoughts and updates from the team.

items.title: Why book with us
items.text: Unlimited Mileage, 24/7 road support assistance, free cross border, new car models and exceptional service! Free extra driver and maps of the Croatia.

items.title: Cross-Border free
items.text: The green card serves as a proof of contractual automobile liability insurance and is used when leaving the vehicle abroad. We offer free cross border.

items.title: Rental Insurance
items.text: Find more info about our deposit protection and insurance policy. You can select: START (Full excess),MEDIUM (Reduced excess) or PREMIUM (Zero excess).
